title: Brazil Halts Meta's AI Data Processing Amid Privacy Concerns
description: Brazil's data protection authority, Autoridade Nacional de Proteção de Dados (ANPD), has temporarily banned Meta from processing users' personal data to train the company's artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms.
